name: Magners Cider
snippet: Magners, branded as Bulmers in Ireland, is a brand of cider produced in County Tipperary, in Ireland, by the C&C Group. Cider or cyder is a fermented alcoholic beverage made from fruit juice.
HowToServe: Cider should be served well-chilled in tall glasses, or else in earthenware cups traditional in northern France.

name: Cider Strongbow
snippet: Cider or cyder is a fermented alcoholic beverage made from fruit juice, most commonly and traditionally apple juice, but also the juice of peaches, pears or other fruit.
HowToServe: Cider should be served well-chilled in tall glasses, or else in earthenware cups traditional in northern France.
